kpi.name: M5006C36

kpi_info.title: BTS HSPA USER AMOUNT UTILIZATION IN DL - CLASS 4
kpi_info.use: The counter shows how many utilization rate samples have been detected within the (80 - <90)% class per downlink direction. Each utilization rate sample calculates the number of HSDPA users in use divided by the licenced number of HSDPA users. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the sample of the utilization rate is within (80 - <90)% class.

kpi.kpi_alias: BTS HSPA USER AMOUNT UTILIZATION IN DL - CLASS 4
